news.title: ARK turns bullish on Coinbase again with $15M purchase after selling spree
news.titleOriginal: ARK turns bullish on Coinbase again with $15M purchase after selling spree
news.summary: Cathie Wood’s ARK Invest added nearly $15.2 million in Coinbase stock across three ETFs, reversing course days after offloading more than $39 million

news.title: Trump Media files for two new crypto ETFs tied to Bitcoin, Ether, Cronos
news.titleOriginal: Trump Media files for two new crypto ETFs tied to Bitcoin, Ether, Cronos
news.summary: US spot Bitcoin ETFs recorded four straight weeks of net outflows, with about $360 million withdrawn in the latest week.

news.title: Memecoin market showing 'classic capitulation signal': Santiment
news.titleOriginal: Memecoin market showing 'classic capitulation signal': Santiment
news.summary: The total memecoin market capitalization has dropped roughly 34% over the past month as the broader market sold off, but Santiment suggests the slump

news.title: Bitcoin holders are being tested as inflation eases: Pompliano
news.titleOriginal: Bitcoin holders are being tested as inflation eases: Pompliano
news.summary: Bitcoin will become “more valuable than ever” after deflation stops covering “up the impact" on the US dollar, according to Bitcoin entrepreneur Antho

news.title: Ether holds $2K, but will $242M spot ETH ETF outflow reignite price downside?
news.titleOriginal: Ether holds $2K, but will $242M spot ETH ETF outflow reignite price downside?
news.summary: Ether holds $2,000, but may remain under pressure as traders watch corporate earnings, US government debt and growing global tensions.
